member.name: T:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.ContactMarketingEmailStatusEnum
member.summary: Specifies possible values of Marketing email setting displayed within the contact card.

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.ContactMarketingEmailStatusEnum.ReceivingMarketingEmails
member.summary: Receiving marketing emails.

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.ContactMarketingEmailStatusEnum.NoEmailAddress
member.summary: The system does not have an email address for this contact. The contact is not receiving marketing emails and can't be added to any recipient list.

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.ContactMarketingEmailStatusEnum.OptedOut
member.summary: Determines the contact is unsubscribed from all the marketing communication.

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.ContactMarketingEmailStatusEnum.Undeliverable
member.summary: The contact reached the maximal count of bounces and does not receive marketing emails any more.
